step_four.subtitle: Complete Ticket Assignment
step_four.member_exclamation: You are signed in with your FNid.
step_four.member_text: You can proceed directly to the
step_four.member_page_text: page to complete any required details. Or click the My Orders button below if you need to assign tickets.
step_four.required_text: All required information must be entered by (or for) each Ticket Holder before accessing the show.
step_four.register_text: You are currently not signed in.  An FNid is required to manage order(s) and assign ticket(s)
step_four.register_text_3: used for this purchase, you will then be able to manage your order.
step_four.register_email: You will also receive an email with a one click link to get an FNid.

guests.invalid_thanks: Thanks for coming to fill in the remaining details so we can issue your ticket.
guests.invalid_text_1: Unfortunately the link in your email has expired. Not to worry we will send you a fresh link. Click here or the button below to get a new link.
guests.invalid_contact: If you have any problems please email
guests.hash_regenerated: Please check your new link in your email
guests.completed_text_1: Thank you for completing your registration. Your ticket has now been issued. Virtual events you can use your FNid to login. In person events you can download your ticket:
guests.completed_text_2: You will also receive an email confirmation with your ticket.
